__e: And I've gotten into a lot of trouble lately for letting people in.
Look, I know that you can't call me back, but I keep thinking if I just leave these messages that when you do come home it'll be like you never left.
I didn't get to where I am, Who I am by letting some little gusano like you
Just leaving another message about how today was not a good day.
Lorelai, you do not do this. You do not just leave a person a note.
I thought of leaving you a note... but couldn't go without saying anything.
All I know is my husband is going away for a very, very long time and he's left me with a mountain of debt.
And I even told people that my parents passed away, leaving their wealth to me.
You've done enough, don't you think, Leaving a trail of bodies like A roadmap to my door?
She's got a long way to go, letting people in.
If you'd just left things alone, everything would have been all right.
If I leave, leaving the others, I am no longer a man.
And I have no interest In letting nature take its course.
By letting me see her with another man?
All I need is for her to believe that I was genuine in letting the girl go, which I wager she does now.
So you killed him, left the cash, and hoped he'd be blamed.
I don't know if I'm doing you any favors by letting you stash them here.
He wasn't even in New York, 'cause he was off with his girlfriend, leaving me in charge. So, take that...
